title: Ebro In The Morning - Fugees Are Back, Solidarity with Haiti + Ja Rule Retrospective
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 9/22.

Ebro and the crew discusses the crisis affecting Haiti (16), as well as their previous comments on Ja Rule (38). Laura Stylez has her patented Flashing Lights segments at minutes 8, 33 and 1:06. Also - tweet at @EbroInTheAm about if Shani should still be a Guru after today? (55)

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
